value.title: Write if statements like a Pro in Power Query
value.excerpt: As the title says, in this video I will show you how to write if-statements like a pro: 00:00 The ultimate if-statement 00:40 if statement in Excel wont work 01:50 Use power query user interface to write if statement 03:00 Nested if-statements 03:38 AND/OR conditions in if statements 04:48 NOT condition

value.title: 3 ways to REDUCE DATA In Power BI Desktop (No Premium needed!)

value.title: Can you refresh a single table in Power BI?
value.excerpt: Frustrated that a you can only do a full refresh? Patrick takes it to the next level by showing how you can refresh only a single table in your Power BI dataset. This is a great option for targeted refresh and avoid potential overhead. value.title: Embed a dashboard from Power BI into your application
